Package org.eclipse.m2m.atl.debug.core.adwp

Class ADWP

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.eclipse.m2m.atl.debug.core.adwp.ADWP
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ADWPDebuggee, ADWPDebuggee, ADWPDebugger
public abstract class ADWP extends Thread
ATL Debug Wire Protocol: declarations for ATL VM debugging protocol. Debugger and debuggee share most protocol code.
